articles.author: CP24 Toronto
articles.title: Mike Pence files paperwork launching 2024 presidential bid in challenge to Donald Trump
articles.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence filed paperwork on Monday declaring his campaign for president in 2024, setting up a challenge to his former boss, Donald Trump, just two years after their time in the White House ended with an insurrection at the U.S. Capitol and Pence fleeing for his life.
articles.content:
Jill Colvin, The Associated Press
